# Request for Digital Signatures Solution for Transport Canada

## Description

Transport Canada (TC) is seeking a digital signature solution to support external clients and stakeholders. The existing infrastructure à clés publiques (ICP) of TC is not recognized outside of government, resulting in digitally signed documents becoming void when received and opened by an external party. A digital signature solution from an external vendor is required to address this issue and ensure secure and digital management of forms, among other requirements.

## Objectives

* Provide a digital signature solution for external clients and stakeholders
* Ensure secure and digital management of forms
* Enhance accessibility to TC’s services through any device and from anywhere

## Contract Details

* Contract duration: 3 years, plus 2 optional periods of 1 year each
* Delivery destination: Ottawa, ON
* Security requirements: Yes

## Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement

## Submission Requirements

* Lowest price bid recommended for award
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
* All enquiries must be addressed in writing to:
    + Geoffrey Lalor
    + SSC Request for Digital Signatures Solution for Transport Canada (TC) - Amendment 005
    + Email: [geoffrey.lalor@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:geoffrey.lalor@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
